segments.text: Hello , Can I speak to Tom , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid he is not in at the moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I ask what time he will come back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think he will come back at 3 p . m . Do you want to call later ? Or would you like to leave a message for him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to leave a message . Please ask him to call me back as soon as he returns . I'm A and he has my number .
segments.speaker: S1
